medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began at 9PM last night after a butter-ziti meal. The pain has progressively worsened since then, with no relieving or aggravating factors. The patient took oxycodone for pain relief. There is no radiation of pain, and the patient reports feeling hungry now with no loss of appetite. There were recurrent episodes of similar pain over the last few years, requiring emergency department admissions four times.
